_header: Harkeneth all for your prow / What good John us telleth now
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; John the apostle, saint
_description: Gospel ‘In festo sancti Ioh. apost.’, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Herkneþ alle for ȝor prouWhat goode Ion vs telleþ
                    nou…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He vs graunte of his graceTo come to heuene and sen his face
                    Amen
